title: Ticket #580: GRIDMANAGER_SELECTION_EXPR didn't work until condor_reconfig
description:
Very strange, but Xin @ BNL created a new Condor installation and had set a GRIDMANAGER_SELECTION_EXPR expression in condor_config when he fired up the condor_master... and it did not work properly. Upon issuing a condor_reconfig, however, everything worked.

Perhaps a reconfig handler in the schedd gridmanager code is only called upon reconfig, and not called upon startup ???
remarks:
2009-Jun-18 16:57:29 by tannenba:
Yep, guess above was correct. Patch pushed to the master branch. Resolving.
